General.Name: VisEra Technologies Co. Ltd.
General.Description: VisEra Technologies Company Ltd. manufactures and sells electronic spare parts in Taiwan. The company engages in the researching, developing, designing, manufacturing, selling, packaging, and testing of color filters. It also offers image sensor technology solutions, optical finger print sensors, light sensors, and time of flight sensors; and wafer level testing and wafer level optical thin film services. In addition, the company provides optical component manufacturing, simulation, integration, wafer level characterization, and customized services. Its products are used in automotive, security, augmented and virtual reality, and smart home applications, as well as mobile phones. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan. VisEra Technologies Company Ltd. is a subsidiary of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company Limited.
General.Address: No. 12, Dusing Road. 1, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30078
